title: Financing for Ampara Water Supply Scheme - Phase III
decision_details: - Cabinet approval has already been granted to obtain a loan of US$105,109,000 from Australian Institution for the implementation of Ampara Water Supply Scheme - Phase III.  The proposal made by H.E. the President, in his capacity as the Minister of Finance and Planning, to enhance the loan amount by US$7,538,854 due to identified additional works of the project and to proceed with the related activities, was approved by the Cabinet.
